channel.title: Cool attackable npc's?
channel.description: I am making a custom minigame but i need some npc's to use, I'm using dementhium(639) i have tried lots of npc's but they dont have attack or defend emotes :/ anybody got cool id's?

item.title: Cool attackable npc's?
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

[quote=“allstarrevolutionz, post:4, topic:475448”]Quest Bosses

  • Agrith Naar
  • Agrith-Na-Na
  • Apmeken
  • Arzinian Avatar
  • Balance Elemental
  • Bandos Avatar
  • Barrelchest
  • Black golem
  • Count Draynor
  • Crondis
  • Culinaromancer
  • Dad
  • Dagannoth Mother
  • Damis
  • Delrith
  • Dessous
  • Dessourt
  • Dramen Tree Spirit
  • Draugen
  • Elvarg
  • Fareed
  • Flambeed
  • Gelatinnoth Mother
  • Giant scarab
  • Grey golem
  • H.A.M. agent Walton
  • Het
  • Ice Troll King
  • Jungle Demon
  • Kamil
  • Karamel
  • Koschei the Deathless
  • Me
  • Melzar the Mad
  • Mercenary Captain
  • Nezikchened
  • Possessed Priest
  • Redeyes
  • Scabaras
  • Sea Troll Queen
  • Sigmund
  • Sir Leye
  • Sir Mordred
  • Slagilith
  • Slash Bash
  • Snailfeet
  • Snothead
  • Spirit beast
  • Strongbones
  • The Everlasting
  • The Illusive
  • The Inadequacy
  • The Untouchable
  • Tolna
  • White golem
  • Zanik

Minigame Bosses

  • Ahrim the Blighted
  • Avatar of Creation
  • Avatar of Destruction
  • Dharok the Wretched
  • Guthan the Infested
  • Karil the Tainted
  • Ket-Zek
  • Penance Queen
  • Phoenix
  • Torag the Corrupted
  • TzTok-Jad
  • Verac the Defiled

Non-quest Bosses

  • Basilisk boss
  • Bork
  • Chaos Elemental
  • Commander Zilyana
  • Corporeal Beast
  • Dagannoth Prime
  • Dagannoth Rex
  • Dagannoth Supreme
  • General Graardor
  • Giant Mole
  • Gunthor the Brave
  • Kalphite queen
  • King black dragon
  • Kree’arra
  • K’ril Tsutsaroth
  • Mithril Dragon
  • The Shaikahan
  • Tormented Demon
  • Tormented Wraith

I hope thats enough xD[/quote]
Thanks <3
